toString

public static String toString(URL url)
                       throws IOException
Reads all bytes from the given url and converts them into a string using the response content encoding. If that encoding isn't a valid Java charset, uses StringUtils.UTF_8 instead.

Parameters:
url - Can't be null.
Returns:
Never null.
Throws:
IOException
